RISE Physical Therapy in Carlsbad

Carlsbad Physical Therapy

Visit RISE in Carlsbad

Physical Therapy in Carlsbad

6451 El Camino Real, Suite B2
Carlsbad, CA 92009

Phone: (858) 755-5200 | Fax: (760) 804-1400

Our Carlsbad office is located inside of the San Diego Premier Training gym. This new location has allowed RISE to grow and give back to more of the North County San Diego community. Our 1,500 square foot clinic offers all of the comfort and feel of an intimate clinic, while deliver top-notch physical therapy services to clients throughout the Carlsbad area.
